subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer hasn't had to sweat much in the Australian Open.  The American Andy Roddick is hoping to change that when he meets the world's top-ranked player in the semifinals.
snippet: Roger Federer hasn't had to sweat much in the Australian Open.  The American Andy Roddick is hoping to change that when he meets the world's top-ranked player in the semifinals.
